title: College Board AP Exam
content:
Looking for the header, body, the page number at the bottom, and the "GO ON TO THE NEXT PAGE" font for:

[http://media.collegeboard.com/digitalServices/pdf/ap/apcentral/ap13\_frq\_english\_language.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826020929/http:/media.collegeboard.com/digitalServices/pdf/ap/apcentral/ap13_frq_english_language.pdf)

The header looks very close to Serifa and Glypha, but it's not exact (to me, anyway).

Font: 

 Serifa Black, Minion 

Solved By: 

 [Mike F](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826020929/http:/typophile.com/user/3368 "View user profile.")
author: dxing97

comments.content: The PDF's properties indicate that the page uses mostly Minion and several weights of, indeed, Serifa.
